feed.title: InvenTree Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.5
entry.content:
Security Advisories

There are two security advisories associated with this release:

  • https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/security/advisories/GHSA-vx3h-qwqw-r2wq
  • https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/security/advisories/GHSA-wp3m-jhgv-rhqr

Thanks to @febin0x10 for reporting these vulnerabilities. More information is available on their blog: https://www.getastra.com/blog/vulnerability/stored-xss-inventree/

What's Changed

Security Patches

  • Merge commit from fork by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8229
  • Markdown xss backport by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8244

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] Fix build item over-allocation checks (#8235) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8241

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8214

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.4...0.16.5

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

Security Patches

  • [0.16.x] [CUI] Fix rendering issues for barcodes (#8286) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8288

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] fix part qr lable (#8255) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8256
  • Fix for COOKIE_MODE in settings.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8268
  • [0.16.x] Fix bug in merge_stock_items (#8284) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8285
  • [0.16.x] Clear allocations when manually returning an item into stock from a customer (#8298) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8300
  • [0.16.x] Markdown link fix (#8328) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8329
  • [0.16.x] Add "active" field to SupplierPart form (#8341) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8342
  • [0.16.x] Notifications fix (#8360) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8361
  • Bug fix for attachment updating by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8362

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.5...0.16.6

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

Breaking Changes

  • Samesite fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8390

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] [Bug] Ensure links are prepended with base URL on receipt (#8367) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8370

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8364

Breaking Change

In PR #8390 we fixed a bug related to specifying samesite cookie.

For existing installations, if the value of the INVENTREE_COOKIE_SAMESITE setting is set to none, this must be changed to false - other users will be unable to login to the InvenTree server.

For new installations, there is no change required.

You can refer to the InvenTree documentation to see how this value can be specified.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.6...0.16.7

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

This release includes a fix for a critical bug in the InvenTree installation process. This bug can result in all django translation files being deleted from the python virtual environment, which can require significant effort to rectify. Users are strongly advised to update to this new release ASAP.

Bug Fixes

  • narrw scope of cleanup (#8441) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8442

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8443

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.7...0.16.8

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] UI link fix (#8508) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8509
  • [0.16.x] after_save_stock_item (#8546) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8548
  • [0.16.x] Bug fix: record shipment date (#8580) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8581

  • Fix requirements.txt by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8598

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.8...0.16.9
